channel.title: Is it possible to
channel.description:
i was wondering if it was possible to make an npc that would mimic your combat level, thus, whatever combat you were, this npc would be your combat.
is this possible?

item.title: Is it possible to
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

ive experimented with it and got a little somewhere…

i had to make some ints and methods static to get it to work though, and that in turn messed up the combat ranks of other players etc…

so im not really sure how to properly do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible to
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

Of course it would be possible, it would probaly have to be client sided though since the levels and crap are in the cache.

Read full topic
